attributes.action: Honour Katherine Jenkins with a Damehood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Katherine Jenkins has become an inspiration to young and old alike with her singing and her support of our armed forces having taken on the mantle of forces sweetheart from Dame Vera Lynne. This young lady is truely one of our 'Great Britons' such talent and dedication to her country must surely rate such an honour and this should be bestowed as soon as possible.
